hero.description: Iskra is an advertising and digital marketing agency specialized in influencer marketing, brand building and strategic campaigns with creators, actors and digital talents in Colombia.

strengthSection.title: Our true strength
strengthSection.subtitle: Marketing strategies with carefully selected influencers.

card1.title: We don't sell influencers
card1.description: ISKRA designs strategies with carefully selected influencers.

card2.title: Strategic criteria
card2.description: Our differential: deep analysis, ethics and long-term vision.

card3.title: Comprehensive strategies
card3.description: We connect brands with influencers ethically and sustainably.

pricing.title: Fair pricing
pricing.description: We work with transparent rates that take care of both the brand and the creator. We want sustainable relationships where everyone wins: brands receive real value and influencers are fairly recognized for their work. No surprises or hidden costs, everything clear from the start.

services.title: Influencer Marketing Strategy
services.description: We design strategies targeted at influencers, content creators and artists, aligned with each brand's commercial objectives, focused on impact, reach and real conversion.

services.title: Creative Strategy
services.description: We are a company specialized in the development of creative strategies for brands, focused on designing and executing solutions that generate connection, positioning and measurable results. We work with companies of different sizes, accompanying them in the definition and evolution of their communication based on a deep understanding of their identity, objectives and audience. Our approach integrates narrative, content strategy and creative execution, aligning each action with the brand's DNA and the dynamics of the digital ecosystem. We believe in strategically applied creativity as a driver of value, impact and sustainable business growth.

services.title: Influencer Selection and Curation
services.description: We analyze data, real engagement and brand affinity to select authentic profiles that connect with the right audience and generate measurable results.

services.title: Support for New Influencers
services.description: We guide new creators in their positioning, content, personal brand and first collaborations to enter the market professionally.

services.title: Consulting for Junior Creators
services.description: We advise on rates, brand negotiation, organic growth, content optimization and building a sustainable career within the digital ecosystem.

highlightSection.title: Convert digital presence into real positioning
highlightSection.description: ISKRA is the strategic advertising agency and influence that converts digital presence into real positioning, through campaigns with creators based on criteria, professional negotiation and impeccable execution.

howWeWorkSection.title: Our team
howWeWorkSection.description: Iskra is made up of a multidisciplinary team of professionals in strategy, creativity and campaign management. Each project is developed with specialists who are activated according to the objectives and needs of each brand.
points: Multidisciplinary team activated according to each project
howWeWorkSection.additional: This work model has been designed to ensure operational flexibility, efficiency in management and a high level of specialization in each phase of the projects.
howWeWorkSection.supervision: The strategic direction and direct supervision of the projects are personally assumed, with the objective of guaranteeing coherence, solidity and a constant orientation towards measurable results.

stepsSection.title: How we work at Iskra?
stepsSection.subtitle: We boost your brand step by step

steps.title: Diagnosis and objective definition
steps.text: In-depth analysis of needs, audiences and strategic opportunities.

steps.title: Strategic design and creative concept
steps.text: Development of the unique narrative and value proposition for the campaign.

steps.title: Influencer selection and curation
steps.text: Rigorous validation of profiles aligned with objectives and audiences.

steps.title: Professional negotiation and contracting
steps.text: Expert advice on terms, scopes and contractual conditions.

steps.title: Content production and publication
steps.text: Creative direction and guidelines for authentic and strategic content.

steps.title: Impact measurement and optimization
steps.text: Analysis of results, actionable insights and continuous improvement.

steps.title: Quality control and monitoring
steps.text: Continuous monitoring of performance and compliance with standards.
